Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class FaithPath

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.FaithPath
public class FaithPath
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    FaithPath()
    Constructor for standard faithPath state
    FaithPath​(int initPosition)
    Specific constructor for third and fourth players

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int faithScore()
    faithScore() returns the overall faithPath score (at any time of the game)
    int getCurrCall()
    getter for tests
    int getIndicator()
    getter for tests
    int getPapalCard​(int papalCardNumber)
    getter for tests
    void move()
    move() method increases faithIndicator counter one at a time within faithPath length restrictions If the player moves on a papal event checkpoint position a CallForCouncilException is thrown and it will be handled by Game which will manage papal cards of each player
    void setPapal()
    setPapal() checks the current position compared with the current vatican space and the related papal cards will be assigned or not depending on player position

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public int getPapalCard​(int papalCardNumber)
      getter for tests
      Returns:
      int

    • move

      public void move() throws CallForCouncilException
      move() method increases faithIndicator counter one at a time within faithPath length restrictions If the player moves on a papal event checkpoint position a CallForCouncilException is thrown and it will be handled by Game which will manage papal cards of each player
      Throws:
      CallForCouncilException

    • setPapal

      public void setPapal()
      setPapal() checks the current position compared with the current vatican space and the related papal cards will be assigned or not depending on player position

    • faithScore

      public int faithScore()
      faithScore() returns the overall faithPath score (at any time of the game)
      Returns:
      int
